name: InTechSoft
tagline: A web and mobile development company
description:
The InTechSoft was founded in 2013 and provides outsourcing services and development of web applications on the basis of PHP.

Our experts have the required competence and set of specializations for design, implementation, and maintenance of infrastructure solutions in the following areas: 
— E-Commerce
— Online auction
— Blogs, Business card site, Landing page 
— Social Networks
— Learning Management System
— Custom projects
To realize the need of our clients and partners we use the following tools and programming languages:
- CMS: WordPress, Magento CE/EE (ver. 1.x-2.x), Drupal, Typo3
- Programming Languages: GOlang,NET, PHP, JavaScript, CSS, HTML 
- frameworks: Bootstrap, Node.js, Angular.js, Knockout.js, SASS, LESS, Laravel, Symfony 2, D3.js, Jquery 
- Databases: MongoDB, MySQL 
- Version control: Git, SVN 
- QA
Let's make it real!
